mapper.insert: insert into member(MEMB_ID, MEMB_PW, MEMB_NAME, MEMB_ADDR, MEMB_PHONENUM, MEMB_EMAIL, MEMB_BIRTH, MEMB_GENDER, MEMB_JOINDATE, MEMB_CONFIRM, POST_NUMBER, DETAIL_ADDR) values(#{membId},#{membPw},#{membName},#{membAddr}, #{membPhoneNumber},#{membEmail},#{membBirth},#{membGender}, sysdate,#{membConfirm},#{postNumber},#{detailAddr})
mapper.select: select MEMB_ID membId, MEMB_PW membPw, MEMB_NAME membName, MEMB_ADDR membAddr, MEMB_PHONENUM membPhoneNumber, MEMB_EMAIL membEmail, MEMB_BIRTH membBirth, MEMB_GENDER membGender, MEMB_JOINDATE membEnterDate, MEMB_CONFIRM membConfirm, POST_NUMBER postNumber, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr from member

select MEMB_ID membId, MEMB_PW membPw, MEMB_NAME membName, MEMB_ADDR membAddr, MEMB_PHONENUM membPhoneNumber, MEMB_EMAIL membEmail, MEMB_BIRTH membBirth, MEMB_GENDER membGender, MEMB_JOINDATE membEnterDate, MEMB_CONFIRM membConfirm, POST_NUMBER postNumber, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr from member where memb_id = #{memId}
